title: The Movie-shaped Religion of the Nones, CS Lewis, God, Evil, Sufferring
description:
The last 20 years has seen the rise of the Nones, people who don't affiliate with any religion. This hasn't been a bonanza for new atheists, in fact those who leave traditional religion embrace a sort of karma/justice/spiritualism whose rules seem to follow those of secular screen writers. 

Nathan Jacobs dissects this with his own movie "Becoming Truly Human" and here he lectures a group of Orthodox clergy on what he learned from the Nones. 

Reaching the Nones https://youtu.be/ME54BibXfYs
Clay Routledge Behind the Meaning Crisis https://youtu.be/3luYGnWa7H4
Jordan Peterson and Roger Scruton at Cambridge https://youtu.be/XvbtKAYdcZY
CS Lewis the Problem of Pain https://www.amazon.com/Problem-Pain-C-S-Lewis-ebook/dp/B002BD2USY
Clay Routledge Supernatural https://www.amazon.com/Supernatural-Death-Meaning-Power-Invisible-ebook/dp/B07D3S1YNT
Becoming Truly Human https://youtu.be/vEmBnju-518
Nathan Jacobs http://www.nathanajacobs.com/
Life Itself trailer https://youtu.be/b5kwtJkUdpA
Stanley Hauerwas https://mereorthodoxy.com/stanley-hauerwas/

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/
